WorkItem.Description:
This is started to happen recently since 3.1 before that I never had a problem with rawr. When I try to load my character from the armory I get an error. I run xp pro sp3 and have .net framework 3.5 sp1 installed. Again I have never encountered this error before and I've been using rawr for a long time.
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
